fields.description: We want to automate the process of generating the BOM script in the CI builds.
fields.summary: Integrate BOM script into CI builds

comments.body: [~cwilliams] It would be cool to add this to the new scons build script. It would include the SDK version, npm package versions, the package.json info from each platform dir, and info about bundled modules.
